text: NGC 448 is a lenticular galaxy of type S0^- (edge-on) located approximately away in the constellation Cetus. It was discovered on September 2, 1886 by Lewis Swift. It was described by Dreyer as "pretty bright, very small, [and] a little extended." ==References== ==External links== * 0448 18860902 Category:Cetus (constellation) Category:Lenticular galaxies
title: NGC 448
